text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock No one should blame anyone.  Everyone in the government are working hard and doing their best.  It seems that isn’t good enough for some. Anyway, the figures aren’t out yet, and they won’t be far off. You can lead a horse to water, but you can’t make it drink
